embeddedItem.name: Yucky Fried Rice
embeddedItem.desc: Upon use, immediately causes all allies to lose HP equal to <nobr>15%</nobr> of their Max HP and increases their ATK by <nobr>200</nobr> for the next battle.
embeddedItem.lore:
Fried rice that is golden brown. Eating it almost feels like some punishment game.
You feel a surge of courage just by looking at it.

"Of course, we can just casually cook up some fried rice..."

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

273405.name: Trash
273405.desc: Upon use, immediately causes a single ally to lose HP equal to <nobr>15%</nobr> of their Max HP.
273405.lore:
Worthless trash.
Better carry some with you.

"Some say that in the deep retreats of the Galaxy, an invisible portal will open to those carrying a piece of junk."
comeFrom: Found in destructible objects in Jarilo-VI

641099.name: Protein Rice
641099.lore:
Nature's gift to human society, friend of mankind, savior of lives.
Smooth as egg white and full of protein.

"Every grain costs sweat and blood."
comeFrom: Storage Zone: Voidranger: Reavers or other enemies
Found in destructible objects in the Herta Space Station

988777.name: Recipe: Yucky Fried Rice
988777.desc: A simple equation. When entered into the Synthesizer, it will unlock a new recipe.
